title: Atomic Habits
description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones through small, incremental changes.

title: Clean Code
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship that teaches how to write clean, maintainable code.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
description: A classic software engineering guide promoting practical approaches to becoming a better developer.

title: Deep Work
description: Explores the importance of focused work and strategies to eliminate distractions and increase productivity.

title: The Design of Everyday Things
description: A foundational UX book explaining how design impacts user behavior and product usability.

title: The Lean Startup
description: A guide for building startups using validated learning, rapid experimentation, and continuous improvement.

title: Thinking Fast and Slow
description: A look into two systems of human thinking and how they shape decisions and judgments.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
description: A sweeping narrative exploring the evolution, history, and impact of Homo sapiens.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
description: A counterintuitive guide to living a meaningful life by embracing limitations and focusing on what matters.

title: The Art of War
description: An ancient Chinese military treatise offering strategic wisdom applicable even today.

title: Eloquent JavaScript
description: A modern introduction to JavaScript, covering programming fundamentals and practical examples.

title: Cracking the Coding Interview
description: A technical interview preparation handbook with coding problems and solutions for software engineers.

title: The Alchemist
description: A philosophical novel about following one's dreams through a journey of self-discovery.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: The first book of the beloved fantasy series following young wizard Harry Potter.
A dystopian classic depicting a totalitarian regime built on surveillance and thought control.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A powerful story about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: A tale of wealth, love, and illusion set in the extravagant Jazz Age.

title: The Hobbit
description: A fantasy adventure following Bilbo Baggins on a quest to reclaim treasure from a dragon.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A coming-of-age novel exploring teenage angst, identity, and rebellion.
